nodes.text: Patrick Stutzman is a freelance writer who has done work for Wizards of the Coast on the Star Wars Roleplaying Game. His contributions include co-writing the ENnie Award–winning The Clone Wars Campaign Guide sourcebook.

He is currently (as of 2009) the webmaster of Star Wars: The Forgotten Tales, a Star Wars Roleplaying Game fan website, and associate webmaster of SWRPGNetwork, an award-winning fan website run by Rodney Thompson.
